plot: A man accused of embezzlement starts a life as first a vagabound and later a thief. He feels he is unable to return to his family and home.
title: Yukcheui kil
plot_es: A man accused of embezzlement starts a life as first a vagabound and later a thief. He feels he is unable to return to his family and home.
plot_en: A man accused of embezzlement starts a life as first a vagabound and later a thief. He feels he is unable to return to his family and home.
